A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is visually stunning and uses a great mix of CGI and practical effects. Unfortunately that's the only thing it has going for it. The plot is stupid\, characters act out of character. Plot holes\, continuity errors and head scratching dumb moments are rampant. What really aggravates me about this film is that Disney and Rian Johnson had every opportunity to make an awesome Star Wars film and simply chose not to.
